segments.text: You know ... I did very poorly on that test .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Cheer up ! It's not the only chance in life to do well on a test . There'll be many more .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , you know how I am about exams . I'm a perfectionist .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't worry about it . All in all , you've done very well in school .
segments.speaker: S2
